thread.title: Manny Pacquiao to Retire in April
thread.title_full: Manny Pacquiao to Retire in April

author: Stephanie Savage
title: Manny Pacquiao to Retire in April
text:
Share Article 
David Becker/Getty Images (NEW YORK) -- Manny Pacquiao, world boxing champion, will retire after a final fight in April. 
According to ESPN , Top Rank promoter Bob Arum said the icon of the Philippines will fight in a final match on April 9 and then retire in his home country where he will pursue his political career. 
Pacquiao is currently a congressman for his province, Sarangani, but hopes to run for one of the national senate seats, reports ESPN. 
Pacquiao has won world titles in eight weight classes, the only fighter to do so in boxing history.
